metadata.synopsis: One liner for Replacement Flaming Fist 04
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Flaming Fist guards on patrol in the Park after the Cultist ambush is resolved and the party has taken a long rest

0.speaker: Fist Moss
0.text: I said, and I say again - back! You won't fool me.

1.speaker: Fist Moss
1.text: Step back! You can't be trusted - anyone here could be a cultist. Back, I say!
